metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2468 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm GPU driver in Android before 2016-06-01 on Nexus 5, 5X, 6, 6P, and 7 devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 27475454.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> android driver jdstrand> android kernels (flo, goldfish, grouper, maguro, mako and manta) are not supported on the Ubuntu Touch 14.10 and earlier preview kernels linux-lts-saucy no longer receives official support linux-lts-quantal no longer receives official support

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
